Text: The F. G. Williams House is a historic house at 37 Albion Street in Somerville, Massachusetts.
Triplets:<The F. G. Williams House
1:
--------------------
Text: F. G. Williams House:  The 20 room, 2.5 story wood frame house was built c. 1855 for Frank G. Williams, a dealer in kitchen furnishings, and is one of the city's best examples of a center-gable Italianate house.
